short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension converts the Crunchyroll Unofficial Sub-Reddit's schedule into a sub countdown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension's purpose is turning the date/day in the schedule table into a countdown (Sub-Only). Please navigate to https://www.reddit.com/r/Crunchyroll/wiki/schedule/ to use this extension. Schedule icon by Icons8
